thread.section_title: DoItYourselfLettering.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DoItYourselfLettering.com | doityourselflettering.com | 3 of 259
thread.title: John L

author: John L
title: John L
text: The quality of the vinyl numbers for my mailbox is excellent, heavy duty and clean cut. Customer service always came back right away with an answer to my questions about application. I applied them using the dry hinge method as illustrated. The application was easier than expected, starting at the top center and slowly working the squeegee down and outwards with another pair of hands holding the lower corners up. Worked like a charm and best of all, NO BUBBLES whatsoever. I expect them to last a long time.
